item.description: Back by popular demand. In November we had a presentation that folks have asked me over and over again to repeat. This will not be repetitious. Ron Bouchard is the foremost expert on foreclosures. I have known him for less than a year.During this time i have become quite knowledgeable in the vast area of information involved. I have learned more from him, than from all the books, cds, videos, seminars and conversations with other people doing this work. This meeting will fill up fast. Once I post this to craigslist, there may be no more room. If you want to get the most out of the club, come early and network. dale
item.name: The Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club May Meetup
